Today on the West Coast, Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are the stars with 4 ft @ 12s W and a moderate 15 mph S wind. Expect clean conditions early, especially around the tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s with fresh 25 mph SSW winds, making it a poor day for surf. The day after, conditions worsen further with 6 ft @ 10s SW and strong 41 mph SE winds, keeping it blown out. Best: today.
